column5: I have a beautiful new house with artistic interior design! The futon bed is in my guest bedroom and it can be changed to a comfortable bed. You will have a private bathroom as well.  -keyless entry  -open kitchen, fridge storage  -Your own bathroom -Parking -high-speed Internet -Beautiful park close by -4 miles from shops at legacy and 3 main highways -Safe, quiet neighborhood  -I have a lovely cat, he is very friendly and quiet:)  - I am a world traveler and would love to meet new people
column8: Beautiful new house w/ artistic design
